ygData.subject: Re: [EQ-Quest] Hi, New to the group
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Umm...may be able to help you if you gave some kind of clue what you need help on. To all that really like doing quests, make a vahshir and do the class
ygData.messageBody:
samuelrh257 wrote:
> I am following a (to me) strange dream/quest. I don't know the way
> except to break down the dream into goals and the goals into tasks.
> The tasks into steps. Is there a better way than groping in the
> dark? or is it just best to keep going and hope the road traveled is
> the right one? Any help is welcomed, Sam
>
>
>
Umm...may be able to help you if you gave some kind of clue what you
need help on.

To all that really like doing quests, make a vahshir and do the class
quests. Lots of fun but also alot of hassles. For goodness sake, don't
make another beastlord, those are a dime a dozen. How about a warrior
or a shaman? If you are on Bertoxx and are playing a vahshir of any
class drop me an email.


--
-----------------------------------------
This is a story of twin Siamese kittens, or, more specifically, of their
shared appendage; it is a tail of two kitties.

David Bubenik
-----
'Generally, go mould a egg!...Don't try to cover the bandages freely,
comb them bimonthly.'--from a newsgroup spam with very strange text.

Bebinn Maolcataig 26 Woodelf Druid, Dignatio cum Demori, Bertoxx server

Lindira 23 Vah Shir Bard, Bertoxx
